```css
// Property: importance
// Description: The audio stream type to use when playing the sound.
// Component(s): Ti.Android.NotificationChannel
'.importance[platform=android]': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_DEFAULT }
'.importance-high[platform=android]': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_HIGH }
'.importance-low[platform=android]': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_LOW }
'.importance-max[platform=android]': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_MAX }
'.importance-min[platform=android]': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_MIN }
'.importance-none[platform=android]': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_NONE }
'.importance-unspecified[platform=android]': { importance: Ti.Android.IMPORTANCE_UNSPECIFIED }
```
